description: A customizable menu tab where users can add frequently accessed settings from other menus

settings.name: Add Item
settings.description: Adds a menu item to My Menu

settings.name: Sort Item
settings.description: Rearranges menu items added to My Menu

settings.name: Delete Item
settings.description: Deletes menu items added to My Menu

settings.name: Delete Page
settings.description: Deletes all the menu items on a page in My Menu

settings.name: Delete All
settings.description: Deletes all the menu items added to My Menu

settings.name: Display From My Menu
settings.description: Sets whether to display My Menu first when the MENU button is pressed

popular_my_menu_items.name: File Format
popular_my_menu_items.description: Sets the file format for still images

popular_my_menu_items.name: Aspect Ratio
popular_my_menu_items.description: Sets the aspect ratio of still images

popular_my_menu_items.name: White Balance
popular_my_menu_items.description: Adjusts the color tones according to the light source

popular_my_menu_items.name: Drive Mode
popular_my_menu_items.description: Sets the drive mode such as continuous shooting or self-timer

popular_my_menu_items.name: Wireless Flash
popular_my_menu_items.description: Sets whether to use wireless flash

popular_my_menu_items.name: Bluetooth Function
popular_my_menu_items.description: Sets whether to activate the Bluetooth function
